results.question: How much is the level 1 FVPL as at 31 December 2019?
results.markdown_table_response:
As at 31 December 2019, Group’s Group C’s Group C’s financial instruments carried at fair value as at 31 December 2019 by level of the inputs to valuation techniques used to measure fair value. These inputs are categorised into three levels within a fair value hierarchy as follows:
Quoted prices (unadjusted) in active markets for identical assets or liabilities (level 1);
Inputs other than quoted prices included within level 1 that are observable for the asset or liability, either directly (that is, as prices) or indirectly (that is, derived from prices) (level 2); and

The non-employee director will receive a restricted stock unit award or option grant if and only if the grant date fair value of the restricted stock is greater than the grant date fair value of the stock subject to the option. The non-employee director will not receive an unrestricted stock grant if the grant date fair value of the restricted stock is less than the grant date fair value of the stock subject to the option.

The recipient of the restricted stock unit award or option grant also receives the option to purchase the restricted stock units or the option to exercise the option in the future. The recipient of the restricted stock unit award or option grant may not exercise the option for two years after its date of award. The recipient of the restricted stock unit award or option grant does not receive any cash payment or other benefit in exchange for the restricted stock unit award or option grant.
